text: You wake up in a cold sweat. The bedroom is dark, illuminated only by the faint glow of the streetlamp outside filtering through the blinds. A heavy sense of dread hangs in the air.

streetlamp.description: It flickers rhythmically. Buzzing like a dying insect.

interactions.use: You rattle the blinds. Nothing happens outside.

choices.text: Get out of bed and check the door.
Try to go back to sleep.

text: The hallway is long and stretches further than you remember. The wallpaper seems to shift in your peripheral vision.

wallpaper.description: It has a repeating floral pattern that looks like screaming faces if you squint.

choices.text: Go to the mirror in the corner.

text: You stand before a large gilded mirror. The floor is cold against your bare feet. The window reflects a sky that isn't yours. A shadow moves inside the glass.
The kitchen smells of stale coffee and something metallic. The light is harsh.
You close your eyes, but the darkness behind your lids is alive. Whispers claw at your mind. You cannot sleep.
You manage to calm your racing heart and drift off. When you wake, the room is filled with bright morning light. The dread is gone, for now.
